titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to modify the final rule relating to flightcrew member duty and rest requirements for passenger operations of air carriers to apply to all-cargo operations of air carriers, and for other purposes.
Safe Skies Act of 2015
Safe Skies Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Safe Skies Act of 2015
Directs the Department of Transportation (DOT), not later than 30 days after enactment of this Act, to modify a specified DOT final rule relating to flightcrew member duty and rest requirements so that the requirements under that rule apply to all-cargo flightcrew members to the same extent they apply to air passenger flightcrew members.
